sentences.en: 'sure, " Johnny said. " I'll do anything for my Godfather, you know that, Mike. "
sentences.cn: “ 行, ” 约翰呢说, “ 为我教父,我什么都愿意于.这点你是知道的.

sentences.en: " Good, " Johnny said. " I'll drive you to the airport myself. And thank the Godfather for me.
sentences.cn: “ 说得很好, ” 约翰昵说, “ 我自己开车送你到飞机场, 请代我感谢教父.

sentences.en: " That's what your Godfather figures, " Hagen said.
sentences.cn: “ 你教父也是这样认为的, ” 黑根说.

sentences.en: " The Godfather saved my life once,'she said, " and my brains too. "
sentences.cn: “ 教父一度救过我的命, ” 她说, “ 是救了我的脑袋. ”

sentences.en: Afrika Bambaataa, the Godfather of hip hop
sentences.cn: 嘻哈乐教父阿弗里卡·班巴塔

sentences.en: Because he made a fool of me when he stood Godfather to Connie's boy.
sentences.cn: 因为他在给康妮的男孩当教父时愚弄了我.他背叛了我.

sentences.en: Connie and Carlo want you to be godfather to their boy.
sentences.cn: 康妮和卡洛要你当他们孩子的教父.

sentences.en: Filomena, frightened out of her wits, went to the Godfather and told her story.
sentences.cn: 斐洛必娜给吓得不知如何是好, 就来到教父跟前,讲了这件事.

sentences.en: He also very frequently filled the post of head godfather in baptisms of the subtly - jovial kind.
sentences.cn: 他也经常在那种微妙快活的洗礼中充当首席教父.

sentences.en: He really wants to fulfil his role as godfather properly.
sentences.cn: 他确实想好好履行作为教父的职责.

sentences.en: He was my godfather, and excessively attached to me.
sentences.cn: 他是我的教父, 非常疼爱我.
他是鬅客摇滚乐的创始人。

sentences.en: How does my Godfather know I won't win it?
sentences.cn: 我教父怎么会知道我得不了奖?

sentences.en: No one heard of Al Pacino before The Godfather, right?
sentences.cn: 帕西诺演教父之前也没人知道他, 是吧?

sentences.en: The Don . My old man . The Godfather.
sentences.cn: 从老头子那儿,从我老子那儿,从我教父那儿.

sentences.en: You're mad because he was Godfather to Carlo's boy.
sentences.cn: 你因为他给卡罗的男孩子当教父也就气得不顾一切了.

trans.tran_cn: 教父，监护人，（黑手党下属组织的）首领
